name: tm18
effect: Teaches Rain Dance to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rain Dance to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Counter)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.
flavor_text.platinum: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.
